Question: It starred Demi Moore, Chevy Chase, John Candy and this person sporting an oddly phallic prosthetic nose.
Hints: This person helped Dale start the Blue Line Foundation.
This person is part owner of several wineries in the Niagara region and the company that distribes Patron tequila in Canada.
This person wrote the liner notes for fellow Ottawa born blues musician JW-Jones' album Bluelisted in 2008.
